line.originaltext: 1 cup butter, softened
1 cup sugar
1 cup confectioners' sugar
1 cup vegetable oil
2 eggs
1 teaspoon vanilla extract
4 1/3 cups all-purpose flour
1 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon baking soda
1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
1 teaspoon cream of tartar
1 cup finely chopped pecans
Colored sugar (optional)
In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter, sugars and oil.
In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter, sugars and oil.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3}, ing13, "butter, sugar, oil", "")

line.originaltext: In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter, sugars and oil.
In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter, sugars and oil.
Add eggs and vanilla; mix well.
line.annotation: combine({ing14, ing4, ing5}, ing15, "things in large bowl", "")

line.originaltext: Add eggs and vanilla; mix well.
Add flour, salt, baking soda, cinnamon and cream of tartar.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing16, ing6, ing7, ing8, ing9}, ing17, "things in bowl", "")

line.originaltext: Stir in the pecans if desired.
Roll into 1-in.
Roll into 1-in.
Place on greased baking sheets; flatten with the bottom of a glass dipped in sugar.
Place on greased baking sheets; flatten with the bottom of a glass dipped in sugar.
Place on greased baking sheets; flatten with the bottom of a glass dipped in sugar.
Place on greased baking sheets; flatten with the bottom of a glass dipped in sugar.
Place on greased baking sheets; flatten with the bottom of a glass dipped in sugar.
Place on greased baking sheets; flatten with the bottom of a glass dipped in sugar.
line.annotation: do(ing19, t2, ing20, "uncooked cookies", "flatten balls with bottom of glass")

line.originaltext: Sprinkle with colored sugar if desired.
line.annotation: combine({ing12, ing20}, ing21, "cookies on pan", "sprinkle cookies with colored sugar")

line.originaltext: Bake at 375 degrees F for 10-12 minutes.
Bake at 375 degrees F for 10-12 minutes.
Bake at 375 degrees F for 10-12 minutes.
Bake at 375 degrees F for 10-12 minutes.
